You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &agrave

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Agrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c0/index.htm U+000C0].
  * `&Agrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00c0/index.htm U+000C0].
  * `&agrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e0/index.htm U+000E0].
  * `&agrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00e0/index.htm U+000E0].
